body: Soooo this is the end of the series huh... Pretty underwhelming

I wish the next chapter we will see lapis sister got corrupted 
I wish we will have another 3 chapters
while its really hard to predict what will happen in next chapter
It's been long established that he'd turn into a girl - it's been in the closing promos in previous chapters...

That's it? Come on, i am expecting the boy got raped over here, but not this kind of femdom, how about the demon girl and the sister rape him? Or atleast you can make some tentacle suck his dick dry? Come on, why turn he into a girl??? Not worth my wait even once =…=

Only took like 2 weeks but whatever
This chapter is actually my favorite so far but it really needs the translation, but considering how short the wait was for the last chapter translation it shouldn't be too long.
